title: How do we write a letter to the principal saying that I don't have to pay my fee on time and I take some time to pay my fees? - Quora

response.answer_text: You cannot write and tell someone that you do not have to pay money owed on time. You may ask for an extension but that person does not have to agree.
You have this backwards. They are allowing you to pay for an opportunity. You need to earn and pay the bill to obtain the opportunity. You are only hurting yourself, not them, with you time waste.
